subject: Reminder about class-level @Rule
msgSnippet: Hi, With the JUnit 4.9 process getting under way, I d like to remind again about class-level @Rule, http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29. In my
messageBody:
Hi,

With the JUnit 4.9 process getting under way, I'd like to remind again
about class-level @Rule, http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29.

In my message http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/22647 I
proposed that Alistair Israel's branch was suitable for merging as-is.
Please could a JUnit committer either do so, or explain what currently
prevents that from happening?

Thanks,
Max.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
